languages.text: "Каждое твое слово отравляет этот воздух, еретик. Преддверие святого корабля — не твое "капище", и никогда им не будет!"

traits.locale_text: "Каждое твое слово отравляет этот воздух, еретик. Преддверие святого корабля — не твое "капище", и никогда им не будет!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Your every word defiles the air of this place, heretic. The threshold of the sacred ship is not your temple, and it never will be!"
languages.original_text: "Каждое твое слово отравляет этот воздух, еретик. Преддверие святого корабля — не твое "капище", и никогда им не будет!"

traits.locale_text: "Your every word defiles the air of this place, heretic. The threshold of the sacred ship is not your temple, and it never will be!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your every word defiles the air of this place, heretic. The threshold of the sacred ship is not your temple, and it never will be!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your every word defiles the air of this place, heretic. The threshold of the sacred ship is not your temple, and it never will be!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your every word defiles the air of this place, heretic. The threshold of the sacred ship is not your temple, and it never will be!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your every word defiles the air of this place, heretic. The threshold of the sacred ship is not your temple, and it never will be!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「お前の全ての言葉はこの場の空気を汚す、異端者め。神聖なる船はお前の神殿ではないし、この先もそうはならない」
languages.original_text: "Your every word defiles the air of this place, heretic. The threshold of the sacred ship is not your temple, and it never will be!"

traits.locale_text: 「お前の全ての言葉はこの場の空気を汚す、異端者め。神聖なる船はお前の神殿ではないし、この先もそうはならない」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “你吐出的每个字都在玷污这里的空气，异端分子。圣船的大门不是你的神殿，从来都不是！”
languages.original_text: "Your every word defiles the air of this place, heretic. The threshold of the sacred ship is not your temple, and it never will be!"

traits.locale_text: “你吐出的每个字都在玷污这里的空气，异端分子。圣船的大门不是你的神殿，从来都不是！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Chacune de vos paroles souille l'air que nous respirons, hérétique. Le seuil du vaisseau sacré n'est pas votre temple, et il ne le sera jamais ! »
languages.original_text: "Your every word defiles the air of this place, heretic. The threshold of the sacred ship is not your temple, and it never will be!"

traits.locale_text: « Chacune de vos paroles souille l'air que nous respirons, hérétique. Le seuil du vaisseau sacré n'est pas votre temple, et il ne le sera jamais ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Cada palabra que pronuncias profana el aire de este lugar, hereje. ¡El umbral de la nave sagrada no es tu templo y nunca lo será!».
languages.original_text: "Your every word defiles the air of this place, heretic. The threshold of the sacred ship is not your temple, and it never will be!"

traits.locale_text: «Cada palabra que pronuncias profana el aire de este lugar, hereje. ¡El umbral de la nave sagrada no es tu templo y nunca lo será!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Jedes Eurer Worte entweiht diesen Ort, Ketzer. Die Schwelle des heiligen Schiffs ist nicht Euer Tempel und wird es auch niemals sein!"
languages.original_text: "Your every word defiles the air of this place, heretic. The threshold of the sacred ship is not your temple, and it never will be!"

traits.locale_text: "Jedes Eurer Worte entweiht diesen Ort, Ketzer. Die Schwelle des heiligen Schiffs ist nicht Euer Tempel und wird es auch niemals sein!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ağzından çıkan her bir kelime, buranın havasını zehirliyor kâfir. Kutsal geminin eşiği, senin tapınağın değil ve asla da olmayacak!"
languages.original_text: "Your every word defiles the air of this place, heretic. The threshold of the sacred ship is not your temple, and it never will be!"

traits.locale_text: "Ağzından çıkan her bir kelime, bu mekânın havasını zehirliyor kâfir. Kutsal geminin eşiği, senin tapınağın değil ve asla da olmayacak!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
